# Toggle
Toggles allow user to turn an option on or off.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white',border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <ToggleImage />
</div>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ToggleAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	android:checked="true" />

<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ToggleAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	android:checked="false" />

<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ToggleAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	android:checked="true"
	android:enabled="false" />

<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ToggleAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	android:checked="false"
	android:enabled="false" />
```

```kotlin
toggle.setOnCheckedChangeListener { compoundButton, isChecked -> 
	// Your code here
}
```
